title: Glitch Or Unlucky Occurence
body: I just got into my promos for gold 5 and in my champ select for the first game, i got a notification saying that my acc was logged in from a different device. However, i have never given anyone my acc information other than my player name. I don't know if this is a bug or just a glitch, but I just want to let you guys know that this happened and i lost my first promo game because of this. I wouldn't lie and dodge on purpose because the season is almost over and I had a 9 game winning streak. This really saddened me and i hope this gets cleared up for others if this is really a bug.

replies.body:
This is definitely not a bug, and I'd recommend **immediately changing your passwords** for both your League account and the email address associated with it. Your account's security may have been compromised, but those steps will help secure it.

I'm unable to take back that loss, but if you have any other questions, let me know.
